channel.title: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?
channel.description:
How do i add a sign that when you walk into the wilderness it says WILD with a skull above it? Because when a player walks into the wilderness it does not say WILD with a skull above it on the side of your screen.
Thank you all for helping.

item.title: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?

item.description:

Gl on wildy

item.title: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?
item.dc:creator: @kickingjamie kickingjamie
item.description:
@kickingjamie wrote:

you need to make it so that if a player enters the wildy then it sends the frame that shows the wildy.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?
item.dc:creator: @Motoguyx378 Motoguyx378
item.description:
@Motoguyx378 wrote:

Thanks. Do i put i make a void called public void wildsign(); and put

outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("", 199); int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1; if (level != wildyLevel) wildyLevel = level; sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);

Under it?

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?

item.title: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?
item.dc:creator: @faded_vision Faded Vision
item.description:
@faded_vision wrote:

outStream.createFrame(208);
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("", 199);
int level = ((absY - 3520) / 8) + 1;
if (level != wildyLevel)
wildyLevel = level;
sendQuest("Level: " + wildyLevel, 199);

Read full topic
item.source: How do I Add A Wild Sign When You Go Into Wild?
